00016 #include "rlcontroller.h"
00017 
00018 static void *control(void *arg)
00019 {
00020   THREAD_PARAM *p = (THREAD_PARAM *) arg;
00021   rlController *c = (rlController *) p->user;
00022   while(c->running == 1)
00023   {
00024     rlsleep(c->dt);
00025     c->lock();
00026     c->ydk_1 = c->ydk;
00027     c->y1k_1 = c->y1k;
00028     c->yk_2  = c->yk_1;
00029     c->yk_1  = c->yk;
00030     c->ek_2  = c->ek_1;
00031     c->ek_1  = c->ek;
00032     c->ek    = c->reference - c->getMeasurement();
00033     switch(c->type)
00034     {
00035       case rlController::P:
00036         c->yk = c->d0*c->ek;
00037         break;
00038       case rlController::I:
00039       case rlController::D_T1:
00040       case rlController::PI:
00041       case rlController::PD_T1:
00042         c->yk = c->d0*c->ek + c->d1*c->ek_1 + c->c1*c->yk_1;
00043         break;
00044       case rlController::PID_T1:
00045         c->yk = c->d0*c->ek + c->d1*c->ek_1 + c->d2*c->ek_2 + c->c1*c->yk_1 + c->c2*c->yk_2;
00046         break;
00047       case rlController::PI_SUM:
00048         c->yk = c->Kp*c->ek + c->y1k;
00049         c->y1k = c->y1k_1 + c->d1*(c->ek+c->ek_1);
00050         break;
00051       case rlController::PD_T1_SUM:
00052         c->yk = c->Kp*c->ek + c->ydk;
00053         c->ydk = c->cD*c->ydk_1 + c->dD*(c->ek-c->ek_1);
00054         break;
00055       case rlController::PID_T1_SUM:
00056         c->yk = c->Kp*c->ek + c->y1k + c->ydk;
00057         c->y1k = c->y1k_1 + c->d1*(c->ek+c->ek_1);
00058         c->ydk = c->cD*c->ydk_1 + c->dD*(c->ek-c->ek_1);
00059         break;
00060       default:
00061         break;
00062     }
00063     c->unlock();
00064     c->writeOutput(c->yk);
00065   }
00066   return arg;
00067 } 
00068 
00069 rlController::rlController(double (*_getMeasurement)() ,void (_writeOutput)(double output))
00070              :rlThread()
00071 {
00072   type = -1;
00073   running = 0;
00074   getMeasurement = _getMeasurement;
00075   writeOutput    = _writeOutput;
00076   ydk_1 = 0.0f;
00077   ydk   = 0.0f;
00078   y1k_1 = 0.0f;
00079   y1k   = 0.0f;
00080   yk_2  = 0.0f;
00081   yk_1  = 0.0f;
00082   yk    = 0.0f;
00083   ek_2  = 0.0f;
00084   ek_1  = 0.0f;
00085   ek    = 0.0f;
00086 }
00087 
00088 rlController::~rlController()
00089 {
00090   stop();
00091 }
00092 
00093 void rlController::start()
00094 {
00095   running = 1;
00096   ydk_1 = 0.0f;
00097   ydk   = 0.0f;
00098   y1k_1 = 0.0f;
00099   y1k   = 0.0f;
00100   yk_2  = 0.0f;
00101   yk_1  = 0.0f;
00102   yk    = 0.0f;
00103   ek_2  = 0.0f;
00104   ek_1  = 0.0f;
00105   ek    = 0.0f;
00106   rlThread::create(control,this);
00107 }
00108 
00109 void rlController::stop()
00110 {
00111   if(running) rlThread::cancel();
00112   running = 0;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void rlController::setReference(double _reference)
00116 {
00117   reference = _reference;
00118 }
00119 
00120 void rlController::setP(double _T, double _Kp)
00121 {
00122   rlThread::lock();
00123   type = P;
00124   T  = _T;
00125   Kp = _Kp;
00126   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00127   d0 = Kp;
00128   rlThread::unlock();
00129 }
00130 
00131 void rlController::setI(double _T, double _T1)
00132 {
00133   rlThread::lock();
00134   type = I;
00135   T  = _T;
00136   T1 = _T1;
00137   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00138   d0 = T/(2.0*T1);
00139   d1 = T/(2.0*T1);
00140   c1 = 1.0;
00141   rlThread::unlock();
00142 }
00143 
00144 void rlController::setD_T1(double _T, double _TD, double _Td)
00145 {
00146   rlThread::lock();
00147   type = D_T1;
00148   T  = _T;
00149   TD = _TD;
00150   Td = _Td;
00151   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00152   d0 = TD / (Td + T/2.0);
00153   d1 = -TD / (Td + T/2.0);
00154   c1 = (Td-T/2.0)/(Td+T/2.0);
00155   rlThread::unlock();
00156 }
00157 
00158 void rlController::setPI(double _T, double _Kp, double _Tn)
00159 {
00160   rlThread::lock();
00161   type = PI;
00162   T  = _T;
00163   Kp = _Kp;
00164   Tn = _Tn;
00165   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00166   d0 = Kp * (Tn+T/2.0) / Tn;
00167   d1 = -Kp * (Tn - T/2.0) / Tn;
00168   c1 = 1.0;
00169   rlThread::unlock();
00170 }
00171 
00172 void rlController::setPD_T1(double _T, double _Kp, double _TvP, double _Td)
00173 {
00174   rlThread::lock();
00175   type = PD_T1;
00176   T   = _T;
00177   Kp  = _Kp;
00178   TvP = _TvP;
00179   Td  = _Td;
00180   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00181   d0 = Kp * (TvP+T/2.0) / (Td + T/2.0);
00182   d1 = -Kp * (TvP - T/2.0) / (Td + T/2.0);
00183   c1 = (Td - T/2.0)/(Td + T/2.0);
00184   rlThread::unlock();
00185 }
00186 
00187 void rlController::setPID_T1(double _T, double _Kpp, double _TnP, double _TvP, double _Td)
00188 {
00189   rlThread::lock();
00190   type = PID_T1;
00191   T   = _T;
00192   Kpp = _Kpp;
00193   TnP = _TnP;
00194   TvP = _TvP;
00195   Td  = _Td;
00196   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00197   d0 = Kpp * ((TnP+T/2.0) / TnP) * ((TvP+T/2.0))/(Td+T/2.0);
00198   d1 = -2.0*Kpp * (TnP*TvP - (T/2.0)*(T/2.0)) / (TnP*(Td+T/2.0));
00199   d2 = Kpp*((TnP-T/2.0)/TnP)*((TvP-T/2.0)/(Td+T/2.0));
00200   c1 = 2*Td/(Td+T/2.0);
00201   c2 = -(Td-T/2.0)/(Td+T/2.0);
00202   rlThread::unlock();
00203 }
00204 
00205 void rlController::setPI_SUM(double _T, double _Kp, double _Tn)
00206 {
00207   rlThread::lock();
00208   type = PI_SUM;
00209   T   = _T;
00210   Kp  = _Kp;
00211   Tn  = _Tn;
00212   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00213   d1 = Kp * (T/2.0)/Tn;
00214   rlThread::unlock();
00215 }
00216 
00217 void rlController::setPD_T1_SUM(double _T, double _Kp, double _Tv, double _Td)
00218 {
00219   rlThread::lock();
00220   type = PD_T1_SUM;
00221   T   = _T;
00222   Kp  = _Kp;
00223   Tv  = _Tv;
00224   Td  = _Td;
00225   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00226   dD = Kp * (Tv/(Td+T/2.0));
00227   cD = (Td-T/2.0)/(Td+T/2.0);
00228   rlThread::unlock();
00229 }
00230 
00231 void rlController::setPID_T1_SUM(double _T, double _Kp, double _Tn, double _Tv, double _Td)
00232 {
00233   rlThread::lock();
00234   type = PID_T1_SUM;
00235   T   = _T;
00236   Kp  = _Kp;
00237   Tn  = _Tn;
00238   Tv  = _Tv;
00239   Td  = _Td;
00240   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00241   d1 = Kp*T/(2.0*Tn);
00242   dD = Kp * (Tv/(Td+T/2.0));
00243   cD = (Td-T/2.0)/(Td+T/2.0);
00244   rlThread::unlock();
00245 }
